text: Jon Bakero Escudero (born 16 July 1971) is a retired Spanish footballer who played as a forward. He is the brother of former players José Mari Bakero, Santiago Bakero and Félix Bakero, as well as being the uncle of current player Jon Bakero. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="4"|Real Sociedad B |1989–90 |rowspan="3"|Segunda División B |20||1||colspan="2"|–||0||0||20||1 |- |1990–91 |27||3||colspan="2"|–||5Appearances in the Segunda División B play- offs||0||32||3 |- |1991–92 |36||1||colspan="2"|–||0||0||36||1 |- !
